statements: SELECT * FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ecosystem_name, research_topic FROM research_findings_env_effects;
SELECT findings FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Forest';
SELECT research_topic, ecosystem_name FROM research_findings_env_effects ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, ecosystem_name, research_topic, findings FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE id > 2;
SELECT * FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Rainforest' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT research_topic, findings FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE id >= 5 ORDER BY ecosystem_name ASC;
SELECT id, ecosystem_name, research_topic FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE findings LIKE '%impact%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY ecosystem_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_findings FROM research_findings_env_effects WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Coral Reef';
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT id, ecosystem_name FROM research_findings WHERE gmo_type = 'Genetically Modified Organism';
SELECT effect_description FROM research_findings WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE research_location = 'United States' ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_location, research_date FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Forest'
SELECT gmo_type, effect_description FROM research_findings ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT researcher_name, research_date, research_location FROM researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY research_date ASC
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5
SELECT researcher_name, research_location FROM researchers WHERE research_location IN ('Lab A', 'Lab B')
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT study_title, researcher_name, eco_system FROM research_findings;
SELECT id, effect_type, effect_description FROM gmo_effects;
SELECT * FROM gmo_effects WHERE gmo_strain = 'Corn';
SELECT cultivation_method, crop_type, eco_system FROM gmo_cultivation ORDER BY cultivation_method DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT findings_text FROM research_findings WHERE eco_system = 'Forest';
SELECT study_title, researcher_name FROM research_findings WHERE eco_system = 'Ocean' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM gmo_effects WHERE effect_type = 'Direct Impact' AND eco_system = 'Grassland';
SELECT cultivation_method, crop_type FROM gmo_cultivation WHERE eco_system = 'Desert' ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT id, ecosystem, effect_on_environment FROM research_findings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE type = 'Forest';
SELECT name, origin FROM gmo_species ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE ecosystem = 'Amazon Rainforest';
SELECT id, effect_on_environment FROM research_findings WHERE gmo_species = 'Rice';
SELECT name, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT * FROM ecosystems WHERE type = 'Aquatic' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, modification_technique FROM gmo_species WHERE origin = 'USA' GROUP BY name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM GMO_Research;
SELECT id, location, crop_type FROM GMO_Research WHERE research_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT findings FROM GMO_Research WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT institution, specialization FROM Researchers WHERE name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT ecosystem_name, climate FROM Ecosystems ORDER BY climate DESC;
SELECT * FROM GMO_Research WHERE crop_type='Corn' ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT location, research_date FROM GMO_Research WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND crop_type='Wheat';
SELECT r.name, r.specialization, e.ecosystem_name FROM Researchers r JOIN Experiments ex ON r.id = ex.researcher_id JOIN Ecosystems e ON ex.ecosystem_id = e.id WHERE ex.duration_days > 30;

SELECT e.ecosystem_name, r.name, COUNT(*) AS experiment_count FROM Experiments ex JOIN Ecosystems e ON ex.ecosystem_id = e.id JOIN Researchers r ON ex.researcher_id = r.id GROUP BY ex.ecosystem_id, ex.researcher_id;
SELECT parameter, AVG(result_value) AS average_result FROM Results WHERE result_value > 0 GROUP BY parameter HAVING AVG(result_value) > 50;
